pkgmetadata.longdescription: bcolz provides columnar and compressed data containers. Columnstorage allows for efficiently querying tables with a large number ofcolumns. It also allows for cheap addition and removal of column. Inaddition, bcolz objects are compressed by default for reducingmemory/disk I/O needs. The compression process is carried outinternally by Blosc, a high-performance compressor that is optimizedfor binary data.
